With Virat Kohli's form a concern and Kuldeep Yadav's potential inclusion, India seeks to end the tour on a high note. Australia, bolstered by Josh Inglis's return, eyes a 3-0 sweep.

title: Thyroid cancer: Simple lifestyle tweaks that can help prevent the risk
description: Preventing thyroid cancer is now possible through lifestyle changes. Maintaining a healthy weight, limiting radiation exposure, and adopting a plant-rich diet are crucial. Avoiding tobacco and being aware of early signs like neck swelling or hoarseness are also vital. Stress management and targeted screening for high-risk individuals further bolster prevention efforts.

While state-run firms will absorb initial costs of finding alternative supplies at market rates, the impact on consumers is currently minimal. Refiners are preparing for a future without Russian oil, assessing compliance needs and potential market shifts.

title: EV share in car sales nearly doubles in year; rises to 5% - details
description: Electric vehicle adoption in India is accelerating, with sales nearly doubling in the first half of FY26 compared to the previous year. EVs now represent around 5% of total passenger vehicle sales, up from 2.6%. Major players like JSW MG Motor and Tata Motors are leading this surge, with luxury brands also reporting significant growth in their green car offerings.

The party also criticized Modi's stance on caste census and the protection of Bihar's reservation laws.

Despite these early actions, the dangerous weapons continued to be sold openly and online, leading to a "dark Diwali" tragedy with hundreds injured. title: Trouble in ‘soy State’: Madhya Pradesh soybean farmers lose interest over multiple factors

A.M. Jigeesh reports on a brewing crisis

title: Andhra, Rajasthan bus fires: 2 incidents in a month spark concerns; focus on strict safety norms
description: The tragic bus fires in Andhra and Rajasthan, which have taken the lives of more than 40 individuals, have sparked urgent discussions around passenger safety. As authorities roll out stricter bus body regulations, including the incorporation of fire alarms and emergency exits, significant challenges remain due to outdated vehicles and insufficient local enforcement.

Survivors recounted harrowing escapes, using fists and laptops to break windows and flee the inferno. Amidst panic, acts of courage and desperation unfolded as individuals fought for survival, leaving lasting impressions of the near-fatal ordeal.

1 doctor for 1,000 people: WHO 'standard' that never was
description: The widely cited 1 doctor per 1,000 population ratio is a myth, the WHO has clarified. This figure, often used by governments to justify expanding medical colleges, lacks WHO backing. Experts emphasize that health workforce planning must consider unique national needs, not a universal benchmark. The actual WHO threshold for essential health services is higher and more nuanced.

The complaint seeks an FIR for the deaths of 34 pilgrims in a landslide on August 26, following weather warnings. The judge directed the report within two weeks.

This win, despite the party's assembly strength, has led to allegations of cross-voting and a "fixed match" from opposition leaders.

title: Cardi B admits she wishes 'Offset was better' amid pregnancy with Stefon Diggs
description: Cardi B is preparing to welcome her fourth child with Stefon Diggs while navigating a difficult divorce from Offset. She recently expressed her wish for Offset to be a better person for their children, acknowledging his past infidelity. Offset has since admitted to cheating, taking responsibility for his "bad decisions."

Shiv Sena's Sanjay Raut condemned this as a privacy breach, demanding the minister's arrest. Bawankule later clarified that the party links booth-level WhatsApp groups to its war room for communication and feedback.

Their enduring affection was evident in past interviews and public appearances, showcasing a decade of marriage.

Sparks from the collision, combined with flammable bus materials and a cargo of cell phones, rapidly intensified the blaze. Authorities have established the sequence of events and are proceeding with victim identification and body repatriation.

description:
In 1979, former Chief Minister J. Jayalalithaa, then known only as an actor, launched a scathing critique of Iran’s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini for his decision to ban all music from the country’s radio and television. 
Her critique began with a local issue: the decision of All India Radio (AIR) to ban the song Oram Po, Oram Po Rukumani Vandi Varuthu from the 1979 Tamil film Ponnu Oorukku Pudusu.

title: Shocker! Shan Masood takes new role in PCB; first active Test captain to do so
description: Pakistan Cricket Board has appointed Test captain Shan Masood as Consultant of International Cricket, a move that places him within the board's administrative hierarchy while he continues to lead the national team. This unconventional dual role, announced by PCB on Friday, has sparked debate over governance and decision-making within Pakistan cricket.

description: TikTok creator Emman Atienza, 19, daughter of TV host Kim Atienza, passed away by suicide in Los Angeles on October 22. Known for her honest discussions on self-love and mental health, her passing has deeply affected her family, friends, and thousands of young followers who found solace in her online presence.

title: Will Bihar say 'Tejashwi Bhava'? Mahagathbandhan's latest election gamble explained
description: The Mahagathbandhan has named 36-year-old Tejashwi Yadav as its chief ministerial face for the Bihar elections, aiming to consolidate its M-Y base and present a youth-driven alternative. This move contrasts with the NDA's aging leadership and indecision, but risks alienating other OBC groups and faces the 'Jungle Raj' narrative.

title: OpenAI’s Airbnb ties: Brian Chesky to friend Sam Altman; can’t use ChatGPT right now
description: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky expressed interest in integrating OpenAI's ChatGPT, but found its current SDK insufficient for their needs. While Airbnb already uses AI, the trend favors customizable open-source models, with Chinese tech giants like Alibaba leading the charge by releasing advanced, cost-effective systems and fostering a vast open-source AI ecosystem.

title: Andre Agassi & Steffi Graf’s daughter Jaz introduces adorable new partner Copper
description: Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf's daughter, Jaz, has introduced a new cocker spaniel puppy named Copper to the family, delighting fans. The legendary tennis couple's children are described as normal, with Jaz enjoying typical teenage outings and son Jaden pursuing baseball. Agassi emphasizes fatherhood as his most important role, cherishing his bond with his children.
